0181B279.Line34.BAE4: Why did I have that vision?

222FF29A.Line10.6D03F: Not just any demon. The Daughter of Hatred. The Mother of Sanctuary.

2C855FCE.VoiceDir26.6D03F: Slight change of tone for Lorath: he knows we're in this with him now.

372B9D0A.VoiceDir40.6D03F: Lorath gestures to the deer carcass.

4AE9C829.VoiceDir30.6D03F: The question can be a bit probing--taking our measure.

62858264.Line38.6D03F: It was prophesied she would come back...

80E9EABF.Line42.6D03F: But Lilith serves neither side. She has her own plans for us.

94A815DE.Line32.6D03F: Rest while you can, then we’ll start in Kyovashad. If we can’t stop Lilith, we’ll all be damned.

B2BBAE31.VoiceDir38.6D03F: beat, trailing off, ending in an exhale

BDDC183C.Line28.BAE4: Use it. Find out what she’s after.

C89108E2.Line36.6D03F: She was banished ages ago, but this world is her creation. (sigh)

D8F1EA65.Line3.BAE4: I wish it wasn’t true, but it is.

DB027B0F.Line6.6D03F: (chewing) Thank those friendly villagers. They gave you the blood of Lilith.

DC4F3401.Line26.6D03F: Good. Then we’re in this together.

E4DE41AB.VoiceDir32.6D03F: Getting down to business. A beat between the two sentences.

E6F5713D.Line40.6D03F: Sanctuary has always been trapped amid the Eternal Conflict, a war between angels and demons.

FAB39C5C.Line30.6D03F: Not sure yet, but you two share a connection. What will you do about it?
